name: The Mirror Image
description:
This is my entry for the GCO Game Jam 2018 on itch.io. The theme was Reflection. This game fits the theme as an object is reflected over a horizontal line. 

This game features a short fun gameplay experience. There are three interesting levels in this game. In each level, the player must be able to make an object reach a door to complete the level. However, if the object or its reflection hits any purple objects, the player will have to restart the level that the player is in again.

Features:

*3 carefully designed levels.

*Entertaining gameplay.

*Great UI and font.

*Amazing music and sound effects.

The controls for the game are told in the game. 

Controls:

For the object that the player controls:

* Use the up arrow key or W to move up. 

* Use the down arrow key or S to move down. 

* Use the left arrow key or A to move left. 

* Use the right arrow key or D to move right.

As the player moves the object, the reflection of the object will also move. If the object or its reflection touches a purple object, the player will have to restart the level that the player is in again.
